name: ADD
input: int main() { return 1 + 1; }

name: MOD
input: int main() { return 5 % 2; }

name: IF_BLOCK
input: int main() { if (1) { return 1; } else { return 2; } }

name: FOR_BLOCK
input: int main() { int a= 1; for (int i=0; i<3; i=i+1) { a = a*2;} return a; }

name: WHILE_RETURN
input: int main() { int a= 1; while () { a = a*2; if (a>4) { return a; } } }

name: EXTERNAL_FUNC0
input: int foo(); int main() { return foo(); }

name: EXTERNAL_FUNC1
input: int foo(); int bar(int a, int b); int main() { return foo() + bar(3,5); }

name: MULFUNC0
input: int a() { return 3 * 4; } int main() { return a(); }

name: MULFUNC1
input: int a() { return 3 * 4; } int main() { return a() + a(); }

name: MULFUNC2
input: int a() { return 3 * 4; } int b() { return 5 / 2; }int main() { return a() + b(); }

name: ARG0
input: int a(int x) { return x * 4; }int main() { return a(1); }

name: ARG1
input: int a(int x, int y) { return x / y; } int main() { return a(9,3); }

name: POSTINCREMENT
input: int main() { int a=1; if (a++ == 1) { return 123 + a; } else { return 12 + a; } }

name: PREINCREMENT
input: int main() { int a=1; if (++a == 2) { return 123 + a; } else { return 12 + a; } }

name: LNOT
input: int main() { return !(1!=1); }

name: NOT
input: int main() { if (~0 != 1) { return 123; } else { return 12; } }

name: REFDEREF
input: int main() { int a=1; int b=&a; int c=*b; return c; }

name: SIZEOF0
input: int main() { return sizeof(1); }

name: SHIFT
input: int main() { return 1 << 3; }

name: LAND
input: int main() { return 1 && 0; }

name: LOR
input: int main() { return 1 || 0; }

name: AND
input: int main() { return 15 & 3; }

name: OR
input: int main() { return 8 | 4 | 2 | 1; }

name: XOR
input: int main() { return 15 ^ 3; }

name: ASSIGN_ADD
input: int main() { int a=1; a+=2; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_SUB
input: int main() { int a=3; a-=2; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_MUL
input: int main() { int a=2; a*=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_DIV
input: int main() { int a=6; a/=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_MOD
input: int main() { int a=5; a%=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_LSHIFT
input: int main() { int a=1; a<<=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_RSHIFT
input: int main() { int a=8; a>>=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_AND
input: int main() { int a=15; a&=3; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_OR
input: int main() { int a=8; a|=4; return a; }

name: ASSIGN_XOR
input: int main() { int a=15; a^=3; return a; }

name: CONDITIONAL0
input: int main() { return 1 ? 123 : 12; }

name: CONDITIONAL1
input: int main() { return 0 ? 123 : 12; }

name: CONDITIONAL2
input: int main() { return 0 ? 123 : 12 ? 1 : 2; }

name: PTR0
input: int *main() {int x; int *y; y = &x; *y = 3; return x; }

name: SIZEOF1

name: SIZEOF2

name: REDEFINITION0

name: REDEFINITION1
